title: GAMING СЛУШАЛКИ HYPERX CLOUD II - GAMING HEADSET GUNMETAL KHX-HSCP-GM WIRED
description:
Form factor: Over ear, circumaural, closed back
Color: Black-Gunmetal
Audio Controls: Audio control box
Connection Type: Wired 3.5mm (4-pole CTIA), Wired USB
Cable length: 1m
Ear Cushions: Memory foam and premium leatherette
Element: Electret condenser microphone
Frame Type: Aluminum
Frequency Response: 10Hz-23kHz
Sampling Rates: 8kHz, 16kHz, 32kHz, 44.1kHz, 48kHz
Sensitivity: 98dBSPL/mW at 1kHz
Sensitivity - Microphone: -42dBV (1V/Pa at 1kHz)
USB Audio Format: Stereo
USB: USB 2.0
Included Virtual Surround Sound: HyperX Virtual 7.1 Surround Sound
Total Harmonic Distortion: < 2%
Driver: Dynamic, 53mm with neodymium magnets
Compatibility: PC, PS5™, PS4™, Xbox Series X|S™, Xbox One™, Nintendo Switch™, Mobile
